website_summaries.verdict: A fresh fragrance with sandalwood, musk, and patchouli that users love for its sophistication.
pros: Praised for being fashion-forward and elegant, this perfume stands out for its versatility
It can easily be worn for day or evening
It is also recommended as an especially good spring perfume
cons: A few feel this isn't as long-lasting as some other fragrances, and some say the fruity notes are too strong

customer_reviews.title: 3 oz at 38 with free shipping with great quality.
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievably expensive. Found it somewhere else for a 3.3 oz at 38 with free shipping with great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: Look closely to the ounces
customer_reviews.text: I usually purchase this product here all of the time, and I did it again but didn’t pay attention to the size. When it showed up I thought it was a gift before the actual perfume. It is so small and ridiculously expensive. I usually pay a little more for 3 times more perfume. Such a rip off!!!!! So disappointed that amazon would even sell this here. Lesson learned the hard way.
customer_reviews.author: MWood

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: You can't beat Burberry of London and this is no exception. I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberchick

customer_reviews.title: This will always be THE GREATEST PERFUME OF ALL TIME!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been in love with this particular scent since forever. It's soft and deep. I will purchase more of this perfume soon, as I have finally run out.
customer_reviews.author: Tierra Beloved

customer_reviews.title: My signature scent
customer_reviews.text: One of my all time favorite scents ! Very sexy signature scent
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: To know I could order this item online from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: This item was a gift for my daughter for Christmas. To my knowledge she likes this fragrance.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda F. Fiala

customer_reviews.title: Rip off size
customer_reviews.text: Why did I just pay 60$ for a bottle that is the size of my palm. Ridiculous
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love Burberry! The scent is so clean I cannot deal with flowery perfumes. It may seem pricey but you will only use this once a day Spray lightly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fake/knock off perfume
customer_reviews.text: The perfume does not smell like original Burberry. It seems to be a knock off/fake. I suggest you buy direct from Burberry or a reputable supplier.
customer_reviews.author: OrlandoShopper

customer_reviews.title: Total Rip Off
customer_reviews.text: Amazon is charging the same amount for a 1 oz as I purchased at a store for a large bottle. completely misleading. Buy local
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Smell cheap
customer_reviews.text: Smell strong and cheap! Almost like the perfume you buy from the dollar store!
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Williams

customer_reviews.title: smells good
customer_reviews.text: It is the softest smell you can have, it is gloriuos
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Benitez

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t smell like the sample in Cosmo
customer_reviews.text: Discovered this scent in a Cosmo magazine. Rubbed it on my skin & loved it. Ordered it but it doesn’t smell anything like the one in the magazine whatsoever. For being a nicer brand I had much higher expectations. This smells like old lady Parfum. Wasted $60 bc returns aren’t accepted. Sure wish I’d ordered a sample and not the whole bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Annessa

customer_reviews.title: GENUINE
customer_reviews.text: It is Genuine. I was afraid to order it from Amaon due to all kinds of Fakes out there. I am glad it is as good a you would buy it Overseas or at Macy's. Thank You.
customer_reviews.author: MONICA P.

customer_reviews.title: My favorite scent - a sophisticated yet alluring perfume!
customer_reviews.text: This is authentic Burberry London for Women and is exactly as described. I compared it with a bottle that I have that just ran out that I bought directly from Burberry and the bottle, scent, and packaging is identical. Arrived on time and as advertised. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: K. Seeger

customer_reviews.title: Many compliments
customer_reviews.text: Love this Burberry. I bought 3 different ones until this one. This was the one that smells the best and I had the most compliments on when I wore it. Perfect scent!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tonya

customer_reviews.title: Burberry London Perfume
customer_reviews.text: I love the scent! I am so thankful Amazon sells it now!!
customer_reviews.author: Renee K

customer_reviews.title: I have used this perfume for several years I love it and it is a signature fragrance for me
customer_reviews.text: I have used this perfume for several years I love it and it is a signature fragrance for me. However I'm not sure Burberry is manufacturing it anymore and it's impossible to find in retail stores so I was very happy to find I could get it still on amazon!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: i got it quick from seller and my wife was happy cause its her favorite
customer_reviews.author: NUSA

customer_reviews.title: LOVE the smell
customer_reviews.text: LOVE the smell! And such a cute little sweater on it. Nice as strong floral scent. I usually use Burberry Brit & Sheer, I'm excited to add this to the rotation!
customer_reviews.author: JKEIL

customer_reviews.title: The product is real or not
customer_reviews.text: My husband gave me surprise with this perfume and I really loved it the smell is sooooooo good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Win/win
customer_reviews.text: Got bonus points for getting this, I love the way this smells on my wife. She loves me for surprising her with it. Win/win
customer_reviews.author: Like to think I'm still sexy at 70

customer_reviews.title: Nice aroma.
customer_reviews.text: Nice aroma, but doesn’t smell like my wife’s eponymous raincoat.
customer_reviews.author: Duke

customer_reviews.title: No returns- not the item I ordered
customer_reviews.text: This is not the sent described. I have used Burberry that I love for the last couple years, this bottle I received is not the one that was in the picture, and smells horrible. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: amber pierce

customer_reviews.title: My mom loves it.
customer_reviews.text: My mom loves this scent. A great floral scent that she calls "sophisticated". Wears it often and with pride. I would highly suggest.
customer_reviews.author: James Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Fragrance
customer_reviews.text: This is my girlfriends number one favorite perfume; it is quite nice and it shipped quickly and arrived undamaged. I couldn't ask for more.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: NOT GOOD..
customer_reviews.text: NOT GOOD... The perfume doesn't hold the smell even for half hour. I can't return too... please don't buy this as its waste of money. :(
customer_reviews.author: Sanja

customer_reviews.title: I did not like this at all
customer_reviews.text: I did not like this at all. I'm not sure if its not real or what but definitely not worth the money!!
customer_reviews.author: BRANDI PRECIADO

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: In original packaging and smells great! Not a problem at all with the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda T

customer_reviews.title: Better Smelling Perfums Out There
customer_reviews.text: Does not improve a woman's attractiveness. Can not return under policy.
customer_reviews.author: Allen W.

customer_reviews.title: My favorite!
customer_reviews.text: It arrive in mint condition and the bottle is larger than I was expecting. If you are looking for a soft springtime perfume...you have found it with this scent. Cheers Mate!
customer_reviews.author: Nadine Murphy

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE THIS PERFUME!!!
customer_reviews.text: This has been my longest and most favorite signature perfume!!! Anyone who smells it falls in love with it!!! It has an amazing classy unique smell that you can't find in many perfumes! I bought this and it came in SUPER fast! I absolutely love this perfume!!! Buy it!!! I PROMISE YOU WILL LOVE IT! Just s bit upset that the price increased :( but still an amazing perfume! Came in perfectly packaged and untouched! Thanks Amazon!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amina

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I like the smell, amount, bottle, and happy about prompt delivery
customer_reviews.author: ghawtha ahmad

customer_reviews.title: This is one perfume you got to have. I ...
customer_reviews.text: This is one perfume you got to have. I purchased it for myself and later for my mom. Its a must have!
customer_reviews.author: Vandana Raju

customer_reviews.title: Burberry Perfume
customer_reviews.text: One of my grand daughters gave me a bottle of Burberry for my birthday last year and when I ran out, I was desperate to find another bottle. So glad I was able to purchase one. I absolutely love the fragrance and believe it is one I will call 'my fragrance' from now on!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Love this perfume. Always get many compliments when I wear it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda C.

customer_reviews.title: Smell good
customer_reviews.text: No longer in production... This was a hard to find surprise for my lady. She adores (as do I) this fragrance.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Allen

customer_reviews.title: This is my favorite perfume! It is so hard to find in ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite perfume! It is so hard to find in stores. If I could order several gallons and take a bath in it without possibly dying I would!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Incredible (It is not spicey or citrus scented and it does not have a bite, so American may find it a bit flowery but I love it)
customer_reviews.text: This is for men. I love it and my boyfriend loves it. Its strongest note is similar to a perfume that Diane Von Furstenberg had in the 80's (maybe she still does). In her perfume it had two very different notes (scents). Depending on your body chemistry, one or the other note was dominant. They were both nice but one was sensational. Unfortunately most women picked up the one that was really nice and only a few women got the sensational scent. This Parfum reminds me of that sensational scent.
customer_reviews.author: Libertysings

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY! This is not the right perfume. Wrong scent and wrong color
customer_reviews.author: Trudy Cox

customer_reviews.title: The problem was the size, the picture show the ...
customer_reviews.text: The problem was the size, the picture show the size, but when I received the perfume it was not the size I was expecting to
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Knock off
customer_reviews.text: This does not smell or look like the real Burberry London. Knock off. Dont waste your money! Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Kiersten Banaszak

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and long lasting
customer_reviews.text: This is my first Burberry perfume and I love it. It has an intriguing and attractive floral scent. An initial rosy scent that opens up to a boutique of jasmine, and finally a base note of musk and sandalwood. Very pleasant and lovely. This perfume appears to be quite long lasting. I could still detect a faint hint of it in the next morning. I also like the beautiful package that it comes in. A rectangular glass bottle that is wrapped in a classy checker fabric. It would be a lovely gift for yourself or your loved one.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter Warrior

customer_reviews.title: Favorite
customer_reviews.text: Yes, this is an expensive perfume. Everyone has their own unique scent that certain fragrances can mix well with. For me this is the chosen one. Every time I wear it I get complimented on how good I smell. I have a weakness for expensive/designer perfume and I've worn lots of different brands, this is the only one I get complimented on each time I wear it. Plus the scent lasts all day (and even into the next day if you're a stay out all night type.) Granted, it might not work well for everyone, but for me it's a hit and the only reason I don't wear it exclusively is because of the price tag.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda_Anne

customer_reviews.title: Great Scent that lasts a Long Time!
customer_reviews.text: My wife got a bottle for her birthday last year and loved it-it has been a staple in her own personal perfume department. She loves the hint of jasmine which she loves as well as the family. She puts it on and it stays with her for hours and every room that she goes into it smells that way for a long period of time which I personally love. Some of these perfumes/colognes seem watered down-they smell good at first but then disappear but not with this product. Great London scent from the great Burberry!
customer_reviews.author: Steve J.

customer_reviews.title: My wife's new favorite
customer_reviews.text: Buying perfume for my wife can be like walking through a field of land mines - she's *very* particular! But she loves this one! (much more than the). The scent is hard to describe - floral and light at first, but a second spray and it seems much stronger and richer, yet not overwhelming. Plus it lasts well throughout the day. After a number of misses, I'm just glad I found something she likes.
customer_reviews.author: J. Green

customer_reviews.title: Classy refreshing and long-lasting
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite scent. I received this as a gift from my boyfriend last year and I am just now getting down to the end of it. Suffice to say, it lasts a long time. I practically use it about once a day and it has lasted me an entire year! The smell isn't over bearing and is long lasting.
customer_reviews.author: DiscoLemonade

customer_reviews.title: I have found my signature fragrance!
customer_reviews.text: What a beautiful unique fragrance! I have been hearing about Burberry London on the beauty vlogs I subscribe to on YouTube and was so excited to get the chance to review. The scent is simply awesome. It's a flowery warm woody scent that I can't get enough of.. And for once I have a fragrance that doesn't fade a hour after I apply.. I have been wearing for the last week, and hours after applying I can still smell.. I always hear about finding your "own" scent.. I have found it with Burberry London.. Its just the perfect "me" fragrance.. Totally in love..
customer_reviews.author: Kristen B

customer_reviews.title: Bottle hard to keep ahokd of.
customer_reviews.text: Love the scent, hate the bottle. The bottle is glass, with a fabric sleave that is only attached in a couple places, so it slips up and makes the bottle slip in your hands. I used it only a few times before it slipped out of my hands onto the tile floor and shattered. So lost practically an entire bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too much money
customer_reviews.text: The price is ridiculous.. I saw this at Beals store for 22 and it I loved it.. but not for 56.
customer_reviews.author: Classylady

customer_reviews.title: ELEGANT YET WARM, SOFT, SWEET, PERSISTENT
customer_reviews.text: Burberry London is a particularly elegant perfume, delicate yet persisting, understated yet warm, a mix of fruit and flower. I noted most the smell of honeysuckle and sandalwood but it is hard to separate the complex fragrances it emits. When my wife put it on, I wanted to sink into her neck it was so alluring. I like too that it’s different than the other perfumes she uses. It’s a winner. Classy. I received this sample for free in exchange of my honest opinion.
customer_reviews.author: David Keymer

customer_reviews.title: Super sexy and unique
customer_reviews.text: This scent is DELICIOUS. Super sexy and unique. Guys and girls both flock to it. I get compliments on it all the time and I love that it lasts all day long. Have been using this perfume for 6 years now and it's always my go-to.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Great Scent For Me
customer_reviews.text: I was not familiar with Burberry London, but I like its fragrant scent which is predominantly floral. It surprisingly lasts a long time while being neither overpowering or too much. It is just a soft and pleasant scent that is nice and perfect for me. Since scent is a personal thing, my advice is go to a local store and sample before you buy. While I like this very much, everyone's body chemistry is different.
customer_reviews.author: R PRIUS

customer_reviews.title: The smell is so terrible. I won't buy perfume from online again
customer_reviews.text: This is not original( so fake). you can see on the pic comparing the original from this fake. They glued the cover on the bottle. The smell is so terrible. I won't buy perfume from online again.
customer_reviews.author: ethio_jb

customer_reviews.title: Omg.... it's so small it's not ...
customer_reviews.text: Omg....it's so small it's not worth buying. If it's about a 2 inches tall. Total rip off
customer_reviews.author: Annette Salerno

customer_reviews.title: London delight!
customer_reviews.text: Nice! I am quite picky, and have my all time favorites. This is lovely, and great for days and evenings. Nice dry down...and stays with you delightfully.
customer_reviews.author: Tiare

customer_reviews.title: Smooth, floral, beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This is such a beautiful perfume, it is quickly becoming one of my new favorites. The primary notes are jasmine, honeysuckle, and mandarin, and it smells like a beautiful mix of the three. The flowers really smooth out the orange notes, and I find it lasts quite a long time. This is a scent that really captures the spirit of London. It is both classic and new, much like the city itself. This is a very feminine fragrance, well-suited to all seasons. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: LH422

customer_reviews.title: Smells expensive and playful
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure what to expect when I received this perfume but was pleasantly surprised. It smells expensive and is a little overpowering when initially applied (take caution), however it quickly dissipates into a lovely, light and playful scent. It's not heavy or too musky, but seems like a scent that young or young at heart people would like to wear. A little citrusy, a little spicy and something else...like sunshine. A good gift for the 20-40 year olds in your life. The holidays are coming.
customer_reviews.author: Book Addict

customer_reviews.title: Decent smell, but weak.
customer_reviews.text: It smells ok, in a lemony soap kind of way. But weak. I don't care for soapy scents. Not for me. But the regular Burberry is great.
customer_reviews.author: B. Dunn

customer_reviews.title: BEST PERFUME EVER
customer_reviews.text: MY HUSBAND BOUGHT THIS FOR ME AND I FELL IN LOVE WITH LONDON. THIS IS THE BEST PERFUME EVER. THIS IS THE ONLY PERFUME I WEAR WHERE I GET COMPLIMENTED EVERY SINGLE TIME, MULTIPLE TIMES A DAY ON HOW GOOD I SMELL
customer_reviews.author: andy4210

customer_reviews.title: Hands down the best fragrance
customer_reviews.text: I love Burberry London. I will only wear Burberry London. A little goes a long way. This bottle lasts me a year. It is worth the investment!
customer_reviews.author: Jio321

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely fantastic, this is all i could want in a fragrance
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Who knew Londoners were so sweet?
customer_reviews.text: A disappointment. My wife was super excited to receive this, but after a month of trying it several times, she is not impressed. It's too sweet. A little cloying. And smells 'cheap'. Not quite what she was expecting. But perfume is so personal, and can smell different on different people. Hope this helps, and good luck finding the smell of rich warm London!
customer_reviews.author: Dave English

customer_reviews.title: Did not smell like London Burberry
customer_reviews.text: I sent this to my daughter for her birthday as it is her favorite. When she opened it however, it did not smell like the London Burberry at all. It smelt old....like it had been sitting on a shelf too long. So I went online to return it and Amazon posts that it is a hazardous material and cannot be returned. So I am out almost $100..... Amazon you should at least credit my account and stand behind your products because you were the seller! I hope to hear that you will do that as I am a very loyal Amazon customer!
customer_reviews.author: B

product_meta.title: BURBERRY London Eau De Parfum for Women, 1 Fl oz
product_meta.description:
Burberry London Eau de Parfum is a stylish floral-fresh fragrance. The scent features tender top notes of elegant rose and a sweet heady blend of honeysuckle. Deep heart notes of tiare flower, jasmine and peony are uplifted with a whisper of fresh clementine zest. Solar notes of sandalwood, musk and patchouli add a subtle warmth to create a distinctive and inspiring fragrance. Presented in a glass bottle with check fabric cover.

BRAND STORY
Founded in 1856, Burberry is led by principles of design, innovation and expert craftsmanship. Our signature fragrances are presented in crafted glass bottles, with scents inspired by music and fashion, London and British icons.
